author: Aleix Pol
message:
Great stuff Aurélien! :)
It's starting to pay off already!! ^^ our qml documentation looks great now :)

author: David Boddie
message:
You could either fork the QML parsing part of QDoc, which is actually part of the original QML parser, or you could possibly get QDoc to generate Doxygen tag files and link your Doxygen document to those.

Neither of those solutions are perfect. If I had to choose one of them, I would probably choose the first one and write a plugin for Doxygen.
